headline: Classic Minestrone Soup
name: Classic Minestrone Soup
description: Follow this easy minestrone soup recipe for a hearty pot of soup with fresh vegetables, pasta, cannellini beans, and herbs in a savory tomato-based broth.
recipeIngredient: 1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans, rinsed and drained
1 tablespoon shredded Parmesan cheese, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Sauté onion, carrot, celery, garlic, and rosemary until vegetables begin to soften, about 5 minutes.

Stir in tomato sauce, beans, water, broth, zucchini, pasta, and pepper; bring to a simmer. Cook, uncovered and stirring occasionally, until pasta is tender, 10 minutes. Stir in parsley. Serve topped with Parmesan and additional parsley if desired.
